description: Straight-fitting pants made from 6.3 oz. cotton sateen. Garment-dyed and hand-distressed. Vintage-inspired details. Roughout-suede and leather patches at the back.
fitting_details: Straight Fit: a regular rise and a straight leg.
Size 32W has a 10.25" rise and a 16.5" leg opening.
Belt loops. Button fly with a buttoned closure.
American-made buttons, rivets, and washer burrs. Five-pocket styling. Leather patch at the back right pocket. Natural twill pocket lining.
Roughout-suede "RRL"-debossed logo label at the back right waist.
Coloring may rub off onto fabrics and upholstery.
